Title: A new female teacher has arrived
Publisher: Huadong renmin meishu chubanshe (华东人民美术出版社), Shanghai
Notes: The text below the image:Production has increased again this year, the new school building is spacious,The county sent a female teacher to lead us to learn culture.(今年生產又增加,新造校舍眞寬大, 縣上派來女教師,領導咱們學文化。)
